Question 2
```{r}
A <- matrix(c(5,7,6,7,10,8,.6,8,10), nrow=3)
B <- A
k<- 1
r <- 0
p <- nrow(A)
eps <- 1.0e-10

while (k <= p){
  d <- A[k, k]
  if (abs(d) < eps)
  {
    A[k, ] <- 0
    A[, k] <- 0
  }
  else
  {
    A[k, ] <- A[k, ] / d
    print(A[k, ])
    r <- r + 1
    for (i in 1:p)
    {
      if (i!=k)
      {
        c1 <- A[i, k]
        A[i, ] <- A[i, ] - c1*A[k, ]
        A[i, k] <- -c1/d
        A[k, k] <- 1/d
        
      }
    }
  }
  k <- k + 1
}
A

A %*% B
```
